title: Get triples from the Collection Knowledge Graph
Get People/Organisations/Objects with a link to Wikidata
body:
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
 PREFIX wdt:  <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/> 
 PREFIX wd:  <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/> 
 PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
 PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> 
 
 SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?wdItem ?wdItemlabel WHERE { 
  # Change PERSON below to OBJECT or ORGANISATION 
  ?item skos:hasTopConcept 'PERSON'. 
   ?item owl:sameAs ?wdItem. 
   ?item rdfs:label ?itemLabel. 
   
   SERVICE <https://query.wikidata.org/sparql> { 
     ?wdItem rdfs:label ?wdItemlabel. 
     FILTER(LANG(?wdItemlabel) = "en"). 
   }  
 } LIMIT 100

title: Bringing a Wikidata property (political party membership) into the collection
Get the number of Objects linked to Wikidata, by (Internal) Collection
body:
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
 PREFIX wdt:  <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
 PREFIX wd:  <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
 PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
 PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
 PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/>
 
 SELECT ?collection (COUNT(?item) AS ?count) WHERE {
   ?item skos:hasTopConcept 'OBJECT'.
   ?item owl:sameAs ?wdItem.
   ?item sdo:isPartOf ?collection.
 } GROUP BY ?collection ORDER BY DESC(?count)
